attributes.name: mini
attributes.description: Create a smaller version of the fab

attributes.name: extended
attributes.description: Create a extended version of the fab. Enabled `label`

attributes.name: showIconAtEnd
attributes.description: Display icon after the label (! Only on extended mode !)

attributes.description: Label to show next to the icon in the fab (! Only on extended mode !)

attributes.description: Icon to populate the fab with

attributes.description: Color of the fab icon and label

attributes.name: item
attributes.description: Is the grid element an grid item

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: Size of the grid / grid item { 1 - 12 }

attributes.name: tabletSize
attributes.description: Size of the grid / grid item on tablet devices { 1 - 12 }

attributes.name: phoneSize
attributes.description: Size of the grid / grid item on phones { 1 - 12 }

attributes.name: columnGap
attributes.description: Column gap size between grid items

attributes.name: rowGap
attributes.description: Row gap size between grid items

attributes.name: selectedValue

attributes.description: Style the select input in the outline material style

attributes.description: Icon shown next to the label in the select field

attributes.description: Selectable options of the select field

attributes.description: Error message shown on invalid input

attributes.description: Helper text shown below select element

attributes.description: Is the helper text persistent or only displayed on focus

attributes.name: timeout
attributes.description: Timeout in milliseconds until the snackbar fades away. Defaults to 4000

attributes.name: position
attributes.description: Position of the snackbar. Defaults to bottom

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: Function initiated if the user clicks on the snackbar

attributes.name: status
attributes.description: Status / Theme of the snackbar. Defaults to Info
